Note: I did clear the configuration after updating the plug-in export.

The annotation model is set only after the document has been set, which triggers
a redraw.

Fixed in HEAD.
*** Bug 61752 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

verified in code.
Tom, please verify under Linux.
